howItWorks.title: Upload an Image
howItWorks.description: Choose any image (JPG, PNG, or WEBP) to convert into video.

howItWorks.title: Enter a Prompt (Optional)
howItWorks.description: You can enter a prompt to animate the image in a specific style or mood.

howItWorks.title: Generate the Video
howItWorks.description: Click generate to create your AI-powered video. Download it instantly.

faq.question: Is this AI image to video generator free?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s 100% free. No sign-up, no watermark, and no credit card required.

faq.question: Can I use a prompt to guide the video generation?
faq.answer: Yes. You can enter a custom prompt to control the video output style or theme.

faq.question: How long is the video generated?
faq.answer: Typically between 2–6 seconds per image, but it may vary depending on the AI model.

faq.question: Can I use my own image?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Upload your photo, enter a prompt, and get a video animation in seconds.

faq.question: What file format is the result?
faq.answer: The result is a downloadable MP4 file, playable on all devices.
